about.description:
The glibc package contains standard libraries which are used by multiple
programs on the system. In order to save disk space and memory, as well as to
make upgrading easier, common system code is kept in one place and shared
between programs. This particular package contains the most important sets of
shared libraries: the standard C library and the standard math library.
Without these two libraries, a Linux system will not function.

Kernel-headers includes the C header files that specify the interface between
the Linux kernel and userspace libraries and programs.  The header files
define structures and constants that are needed for building most standard
programs and are also needed for rebuilding the glibc package.
about.license: LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH exceptions AND GPL-2.0-or-later AND MPL-2.0
about.summary: (CDT) The GNU libc libraries and header files for the Linux kernel for use by glibc

index.license: LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH exceptions AND GPL-2.0-or-later AND MPL-2.0
index.name: sysroot-cos7-s390x

name: sysroot-cos7-s390x
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: sysroot-cos7-s390x
    version: '2.17'
source:
    -   folder: binary
        sha256: c6ce1ac0472ec946cf7064e02caad113e4f348fdc1259161d5640dbdb295634b
        url: http://download.sinenomine.net/clefos/7/os/s390x/glibc-2.17-307.el7.1.s390x.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-common
        sha256: e6a3796bf72bd92f31d7aefe0096009bfa8ab592e143362c3c1b73c2129f7bb3
        url: http://download.sinenomine.net/clefos/7/os/s390x/glibc-common-2.17-307.el7.1.s390x.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-devel
        sha256: 1f46ff3924c3d55de7647366a06653db791fe528b06a0be1b3ddd0bea91b752e
        url: http://download.sinenomine.net/clefos/7/os/s390x/glibc-devel-2.17-307.el7.1.s390x.rpm
    -   folder: binary-tzdata
        sha256: a467bd14a5f0fec9e6227eae6aac92c155947a102e818c2bb62e2339e44a694a
        url: http://mirror.centos.org/centos/7.8.2003/os/x86_64/Packages/tzdata-2019c-1.el7.noarch.rpm
    -   folder: binary-glibc-headers
        sha256: 034e49d09f864c3afcf007a991da5c89ee2106ebeb3bdcf8aca61fc4f5ad916d
        url: http://download.sinenomine.net/clefos/7/os/s390x/glibc-headers-2.17-307.el7.1.s390x.rpm
    -   folder: binary-kernel-headers
        sha256: b4bd26bbccab8028d903d250a7e599f77c7c5ea8b7137f96aecf998016799d93
        url: http://download.sinenomine.net/clefos/7/os/s390x/kernel-headers-3.10.0-1127.el7.s390x.rpm
    -   folder: binary-freebl
        sha256: 8c88f6be69f0d88ac91a577cfb507c879446d3950a19843927082bf0d660accf
        url: http://download.sinenomine.net/clefos/7/os/s390x/nss-softokn-freebl-3.44.0-8.el7_7.s390x.rpm
build:
    noarch: generic
    number: 10
    string: h66b9766_10
requirements:
    run:
        - sysroot_linux-s390x ==2.17
test:
    commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/s390x-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/lib/libc.so.6
        - test -f $PREFIX/s390x-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/sbin/ldconfig
        - test -f $PREFIX/s390x-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/lib/crt1.o
        - test -f $PREFIX/s390x-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/include/limits.h
        - test -f $PREFIX/s390x-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/include/gnu/stubs.h
        - test -d $PREFIX/s390x-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/share/locale
        - test -f $PREFIX/s390x-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/usr/bin/ldd
        - test -f $PREFIX/s390x-conda-linux-gnu/sysroot/lib/libc.so.6
about:
    description: 'The glibc package contains standard libraries which are used by
        multiple

        programs on the system. In order to save disk space and memory, as well as
        to

        make upgrading easier, common system code is kept in one place and shared

        between programs. This particular package contains the most important sets
        of

        shared libraries: the standard C library and the standard math library.

        Without these two libraries, a Linux system will not function.


        Kernel-headers includes the C header files that specify the interface between

        the Linux kernel and userspace libraries and programs.  The header files

        define structures and constants that are needed for building most standard

        programs and are also needed for rebuilding the glibc package.

        '
    home: http://sources.redhat.com/glibc/
    license: LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH exceptions AND GPL-2.0-or-later
        AND MPL-2.0
    license_family: GPL
    license_file: nss-license
    summary: (CDT) The GNU libc libraries and header files for the Linux kernel for
        use by glibc
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - beckermr
        - isuruf
        - scopatz
